title: travelplanner: I need to organize a 3-day trip for a group of 3, departing from Asheville and arriving in Minneapolis. We will be traveling from March 7th to March 9th, 2022, with a total budget of $2,300. We require accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. Regarding meals, our group enjoys a variety of cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Mediterranean, and American. (4784408387cfb248)

always_included_messages.content:
You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).

***** Example *****
Query: Could you create a travel plan for 7 people from Ithaca to Charlotte spanning 3 days, from March 8th to March 14th, 2022, with a budget of $30,200?
Travel Plan:
Day 1:
Current City: from Ithaca to Charlotte
Transportation: Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46
Breakfast: Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte
Attraction: The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte
Lunch: Cafe Maple Street, Charlotte
Dinner: Bombay Vada Pav, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 2:
Current City: Charlotte
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Attraction: The Mint Museum, Charlotte;Romare Bearden Park, Charlotte.
Lunch: Birbal Ji Dhaba, Charlotte
Dinner: Pind Balluchi, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 3:
Current City: from Charlotte to Ithaca
Transportation: Flight Number: F3786167, from Charlotte to Ithaca, Departure Time: 21:42, Arrival Time: 23:26
Breakfast: Subway, Charlotte
Attraction: Books Monument, Charlotte.
Lunch: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Dinner: Kylin Skybar, Charlotte
Accommodation: -

***** Example Ends *****

chat_history.content: I need to organize a 3-day trip for a group of 3, departing from Asheville and arriving in Minneapolis. We will be traveling from March 7th to March 9th, 2022, with a total budget of $2,300. We require accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. Regarding meals, our group enjoys a variety of cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Mediterranean, and American.

function.arguments: {"instructions": "Find Indian, Chinese, Mediterranean, and American restaurants in Minneapolis."}

Unfortunately, I cannot find any flights from Asheville to Minneapolis departing on March 7th, 2022. Would you like to try another date?

There are also no flights available from Minneapolis to Asheville on March 9th, 2022.

| Entire 1 Bedroom Apartment in Midtown Manhattan | $107 per night | Entire home/apt | No visitors | 3 | 3.0 |

All of these options offer entire rooms and are well within your budget. However, it's important to note that these listings do not explicitly mention their pet policies, despite indicating that pets are allowed.

chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Unfortunately, I was unable to find any available flights from Asheville to Minneapolis on March 7th, 2022, or from Minneapolis to Asheville on March 9th, 2022. As such, I have not been able to generate a travel plan for your group.

I have, however, located some pet-friendly accommodations in Minneapolis that offer entire rooms within your budget. These include the #1 Rated 3br Park Slope Apt (1700sqf+Renovated!) for $169 per night, the Modern Condo in Heart of Harlem for $191 per night, and the Entire 1 Bedroom Apartment in Midtown Manhattan for $107 per night.

There are also several restaurants in Minneapolis that serve the cuisines you enjoy, such as The Cafe (Indian, Mediterranean, Seafood), Malo (Chinese, Indian), Balbeer's Kitchen & Bar (Chinese), Sahni Veg & Non Veg (Chinese), Nukkadwala (American), Agent Jack's Bar (American, Chinese), and Elite Indian Restaurant (Indian, American).

If you are interested in local attractions, you might like to consider the Minneapolis Sculpture Garden, the Minneapolis Institute of Art, the Mill City Museum, the Mill Ruins Park, the Weisman Art Museum, the Gold Medal Park, the Foshay Museum and Observation Deck, Minnehaha Falls, the Prospect Park Water Tower, the St. Anthony Falls Visitor Center, the Mall of America®, the Walker Art Center, the Central Mississippi Riverfront Regional Park, the Minneapolis Lookout, Water Power Park, Minnehaha Regional Park, the Stepped Tower, the American Swedish Institute, the Boom Island Lighthouse, and Boom Island Park.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
